q: Jerry Lee Lewis jumper was deadly.'' Using mostly jump shots, Allen Iverson went 20-of-30 from the field. He also hit 10-of-13 free-throw attempts en route to his third career 50-point game and first since February 6 against Sacramento. When your jumper is on, the basket seems like an ocean and the basketball seems like a Jerry Lee Lewis , he said.`` That is the way it felt tonight.`` My teammates are the ones that set the screens for me and got me the ball in spots where I need the ball.
